title: Entertainment Live: Justin Bieber and Rihanna to headline V Festival - BBC News
summary: justin bieber and rihanna to headline v festival 2016 .
kylie minogue engaged to joshua sasse .

documents.title: goodbye
text: how do you find the words to say , to say goodbye ?
asked alicia keys in 2001 .
well , we admit parting ways can be hard , but fortunately we 're back at 08:30 gmt tomorrow .
enjoy whatever you 're doing with your monday evening - for us it 'll be catching david schwimmer and cuba gooding jr. in the latest episode of the people vs. oj simpson on bbc two .
see you in the morning !

documents.title: deadpool on course for $ 500m as it clings to us number one slot
text: the 'anti-hero ' movie deadpool is already one of the biggest films of the year - becoming something of a surprise hit for 20th century fox as it grossed $ 152m ( £ 108m ) over four days on its opening weekend .
that made it the biggest opening for an r-rated movie ( r meaning restricted , the equivalent of a 15 or 18 rating in the uk ) of all time , beating matrix reloaded and the hangover 2 .
well now it 's on track to be the highest-grossing r-rated movie in history .
it saw off competition from risen and the witch over the weekend to remain at the top of the us box office chart .
deadpool is now just shy of grossing $ 500m ( £ 354m ) .
to date , and it will almost certainly pass that milestone in the next day or two

documents.title: chicago to hold ferrisfest marking 30th anniversary of movie
text: if you can remember this film in cinemas , or it 's a dearly beheld movie from your childhood , then we are sorry to remind you of your age .
chicago is to hold an event later this year called ferrisfest , marking the 30th anniversary of the cult movie ferris bueller 's day off .

there will be a screening of john hughes ' 1986 film - in which a rebellious teenager skives off school to go on a whirlwind tour of the windy city - and several events attended by stars of the film .
there is even a recreation of ferris 's bedroom ( below ) .
the festival runs from 20-22 may .
altogether now `` bueller bueller bueller ``

documents.title: damning new report finds `` inclusion crisis '' in hollywood
text: a new study has suggested hollywood has an `` epidemic of invisibility '' for women , minorities and lgbt people .
the paper by the university of southern california stated the film industry has an `` inclusion crisis '' from ceos to minor characters .
`` overall , the landscape of media content is still largely whitewashed , '' it said .
it comes just days ahead of the oscars , criticised over the lack of diversity in its award nominations .
read more .

documents.title: tate to host hockney retrospective
text: here 's some big news for all you hockney-philes out there , the tate has announced it will host a retrospective exhibition of the works of artist david hockney .
the exhibition , which opens in february 2017 for three months , `` will celebrate hockney 's achievement in painting , drawing , print , photography and video , '' a press release said .
overseas hockney fans need not worry about missing it , as the exhibition will travel to paris and new york after it closes in london .
it has been a pleasure to revisit works i made decades ago , including some of my earliest paintings .
many of them seem like old friends to me now .
we 're looking back over a lifetime with this exhibition , and i hope , like me , people will enjoy seeing how the roots of my new and recent work can be seen in the developments over the years .

documents.title: paramore 's hayley williams gets married
text: diminutive paramore singer hayley williams has married her long-term partner , new found glory guitarist chad gilbert , in nashville .
what was their first dance we wonder ?
read more .

documents.title: could new day signal a new dawn for newspapers ?
text: with declining circulations and the recent closure of a national print title , you might think now would n't be the best time to consider launching a newspaper .
but that does n't seem to be putting off the daily mirror 's publisher trinity mirror .
the company is set to print its first edition of the new day next monday ( 29 feb ) .
it 's going to cost 50p and chief executive simon fox says he hopes it will `` arrest the decline '' in newspaper readership .
it 's the second new print title to launch in the last decade .
the i paper - from the same team behind the independent - began life in 2010 and rapidly became more popular than its big sister paper .
but launching a newspaper in the internet age is a tricky business , which the new day 's editor alison philips is all too aware of .
she spoke to bbc radio 4 this morning
read more .
`` there has been a massive nuclear bomb gone off in the media world with the advent of the internet , and we have created a newspaper which reflects that and understands that .
so , whilst now there is a breaking story and people have got news alerts on their phones all the time , what they quite often want is a ruthless edit of the day - this is what they need to know .
most people , and we have spoken to thousands of readers over the last year or so , they only want 30 minutes , they only have 30 minutes , everyone is time poor nowadays .

documents.title: the return of richard ashcroft
text: `` it 's easy for me to drift into two or three years of doing nothing , '' richard ashcroft told bbc 6 music in 2012 - and he remained true to his word .
but this morning , he emerged from hibernation with a new single and the details of his first album since 2010 's united nations of sound .

these people , due out in may , was recorded largely in ashcroft 's basement home studio and features orchestration from wil malone , who worked with richard on the verve 's urban hymns , as well as his 2000 debut solo album alone with everybody .
have a listen to the lead track , this is how it feels , below .
ashcroft says the album tackles to such as the arab spring uprisings , the war in syria and the death of a close friend .
here 's his ( rather enigmatic ) typewritten statement .
author: Mark Savage
Music reporter

documents.title: martin freeman and chris o'dowd earn animation nominations
text: actors martin freeman and chris o'dowd have landed nominations at this year 's british animation awards .
they are both in the running for best voice performance for their work on stick man and puffin rock respectively .
stick man , shaun the sheep : the movie and children of the holocaust will compete for best long form animation .

in other awards news , oscar hopeful mad max : fury road won trophies for best period and/or character make-up and for best special make-up effects at the make-up artists and hairstylists guild awards .

documents.title: joe swash leaves the jump
text: former eastenders actor joe swash is the latest injury-plagued celebrity to leave channel 4 's the jump .
swash was recruited after several contestants , including beth tweddle , tina hobley and rebecca adlington pulled out due to injury .
he became a victim of the slopes and broke his shoulder during a training session just days after starting .
the injury meant that he was unable to compete in a live moguls challenge and instead lost out to girls aloud star sarah harding in a ski jump .

documents.title: where did the red carpet come from ?
text: on wednesday evening , popstars including ed sheeran and adele will tread on one and just a couple of days later , it will be the turn of stars such as leonardo dicaprio and cate blanchett .
but when did the red carpet become the ultimate signifier of celebrity ?
apparently it dates back at least 2,500 years .
lindsay baker has been investigating for bbc culture .
author: BBC Culture
BBC Culture

documents.title: legoland builds 500,000 piece death star
text: our eyes are watering at how much this box set would cost you for christmas .
staff at legoland windsor have put the finishing touches to a 500,000 piece death star .
the operation took three days - the piece is a 2.4 metre wide , 3 metre high creation and weighs 860kg .
it will be part of a new star wars exhibit at the park .

documents.title: all saints announce first live date
text: we told you earlier about the v festival line-up , which was just announced this morning .
nestled in amongst sia and david guetta , perhaps surprisingly , was all saints - the late nineties pop band now on their second reunion .
well , to go with the festival appearance , they 've now also announced a live date at koko in london in april .
this calls for an all saints timeline .
1997 : all saints 1.0 - shaznay , melanie , nicole and natalie score number one hits with pure shores , bootie call and never ever and release two top three albums before parting ways in 2000 .
2006 : all saints 2.0 - comeback single rock steady is released , which reaches the uk top three .
reunion album studio 1 fares slightly less well , entering at number 40 .
2016 : all saints 3.0 - a second reunion is announced on social media .
a v festival appearance and a live date at koko in london are confirmed , with a new single one strike set to premiere on bbc radio 2 tomorrow .

documents.title: benidorm to return for ninth season
text: good news for benidorm fans this morning - we 've just heard that the itv comedy is going into production this month for a ninth series .
it 's been drawing 5.8 million viewers per episode this series .
sherrie hewson , tim healy and jake canuso will all return to the cast for the next season .

the happy couple took out a notice in the telegraph newspaper .
the 47-year-old star has been going out with the 28-year-old british actor for just six months .
it 's thought he may have popped the question over christmas .

documents.title: how can a computer write a musical ?
text: beyond the fence is the first musical conceived and generated by computer .
it uses an algorithm which factors in the music of hit musicals such as les miserables and crazy for you .
the question is , will humans be entertained ?

documents.title: flack and murs confirm x factor exit
text: is there an exodus at the x factor ?
less than a week after radio 1 breakfast host nick grimshaw announced he was leaving the show after one series , now presenters olly murs and caroline flack have confirmed they are quitting .
this was an incredibly hard decision to make and one i did n't take lightly as i 've really enjoyed co-hosting the x factor with caroline flack .
it 's been one big adventure and i loved every minute of it but my heart belongs to music and i want to concentrate 100 % on making my next album and getting back to performing .

to show there were no hard feelings , simon cowell has also released a statement saying it was `` fantastic having olly on the x factor last year '' , and described working with him as `` great fun '' .
simon added that the pair have agreed to work on some other tv projects together in the future .
olly 's presenting style received mixed reviews and he famously messed up an elimination , telling a contestant she was leaving before it was actually announced .
caroline flack has also confirmed she 's giving up her presenting job :
i have had a brilliant time working on the x factor over the last few years , and hosting the main show was just fantastic , i made some amazing friends .
i 'm looking forward to carrying on working with the team over at itv .
the pair previously presented the xtra factor on itv2 and received a warm response from viewers .
they moved over to itv to front the main programme last year , but had big shoes to fill - as the last presenter , dermot o'leary , worked on the show for eight years .

with more and more vacancies opening up on the programme , there are several questions hanging over this year 's series - who will replace nick grimshaw as a judge , and who will simon cowell choose as presenters ?
now might be a good time to update your cv .

documents.title: former boyband member enters eurovision
text: ken bruce has revealed the fourth eurovision hopeful on his bbc radio 2 show - and the name might be familiar to fans of moderately successful 1990s boybands .
matthew james was part of bad boys inc , who scored a few minor hits in 1993 and 1994 .
his song , a better man , revisits the slick pop ballads of that era ( the writer 's previous credits include the backstreet boys ) but is too generic to really catch fire .
key lyric : `` you make me want to be a better man . ''

documents.title: five friends reunite for nbc tribute
text: us tv network nbc broadcast a tribute programme to director james burrows over the weekend .
you may not have heard of him , but he 's something of a veteran of the industry , having directed 15 episodes of friends , including - crucially - the pilot .

he must have been popular with the friends team , because david schwimmer , matt leblanc , jennifer aniston , courtney cox and lisa kudrow all turned out for nbc 's celebration - a rare occurrence to see them in the same place at the same time .
matthew perry was the only main cast member absent , as he 's currently starring in london 's west end in his playwriting debut , the end of longing .
the show has had a warm response from fans , despite the poor reviews it received from critics .
among the revelations from the reunion was lisa kudrow 's admission that she was the only member of the main cast that had to audition for her role twice .

dulcima showan and tomas twyman will be performing their original song when you go , a cheesy country stomper with ample banjo and a rousing breakdown .
key lyric : `` i 'm going to light a candle so i can see in the dark . ''

documents.title: women top poll of memorable children 's characters
text: heroines and female villains have outnumbered heroes and male baddies in a literary poll of memorable children 's novel characters .
six of the top 10 heroes/heroines voted for were female , including harry potter 's hermione granger and katniss everdeen from the hunger games series .
however , the top hero and villain were both male - harry potter and his nemesis lord voldemort .
more than 7,000 people took part in the poll ahead of world book day on 3 march .
read more .

documents.title: leona lewis contributes a eurovision song
text: the second uk hopeful for the # eurovision song contest is bianca claxton - a 25-year-old singer from nottingham , who was formerly in the girlband parade .
her song was written by biff stannard and ash howes , whose previous credits include the s girls , kylie minogue , u2 and westlife .
interestingly , shine a little light also has a co-writing credit from leona lewis - and it does n't sound a million miles away from her brand of pop belters .
key lyric : `` i 've been carrying a concrete heart . ''

documents.title: v festival headliners announced
text: the v festival 2016 line-up has just been announced , and it 's going to be a year that pleases pop fans no end .
two of the biggest names in music - justin bieber and rihanna - will be headlining the three-day festival , which takes place in hylands park in essex and weston park in shropshire .
organisers appear to be pulling out all the stops this year , which perhaps is n't surprising given that it 's the festival 's 21st birthday .
have a look below at the full list of performers .
who are you most excited about seeing ?
let us know on twitter via @ twitterid all saints are going to be our personal highlight .

documents.title: eurovision hopefuls being revealed
text: andy abraham !
electro velvet !
molly !
josh dubovie !
if those names do n't ring any bells , well , do n't worry .
they 're all hapless uk eurovision entrants from the last few years , with a meagre 69 points between them .
this year , the selection process has been shaken up with the hope of turning around our fortunes - and you ( yes , you ! )
get the chance to choose our entry .
the six hopefuls are being unveiled on ken bruce 's bbc radio 2 show this morning , so tune in now to see what 's on offer .
`` i have n't heard them at all yet , '' ken admits .
`` i 'll be hearing them at the same time as you . ''

documents.title: catch-up from the weekend
text: some stories you may have missed from the weekend
harper lee , the author of to kill a mockingbird , was buried in a private funeral in her hometown monroevile in the us state of alabama .
the pulitzer prize-winning novelist died on friday aged 89 .
to kill a mockingbird , about racial intolerance in the deep south , sold more than 40m copies worldwide .
magician paul daniels ( above ) , a household name in the uk in the 1970s and 80s , has been diagnosed with `` an incurable brain tumour '' , his family said .
fire at sea , a documentary about europe 's migrant crisis , won the golden bear award for best movie at the berlin film festival .
italian writer and philosopher umberto eco , best known for his novel the name of the rose - which was adapted for the big screen - has died aged 84 .
the 1986 film starred sean connery as a sleuthing monk in 14th century italy .
a lock of john lennon 's hair has sold for $ 35,000 ( £ 24,298 ) .
the four-inch piece of hair was bought by a uk collector at an auction in dallas , texas .

documents.title: glastonbury responds to eu referendum clash
text: we 're sure all of you music fans are considering cancelling your glastonbury visit this summer , after it was announced over the weekend that the eu referendum will be held on thursday 23 june .
but fortunately , the music festival 's organisers have tweeted to remind attendees that they can vote in advance via post , so wo n't miss out on having their say .
phew .
it wo n't be possible to have an # eureferendum polling station at glastonbury 2016 .
you can register for postal votes
@ twitterid why not ? ?
this would be an amazing way to get the 18-24 cohort who are a low % of voters in action # eureferendum # glastonbury
@ twitterid @ twitterid coz you have to vote in the council area where you are registered .
but if you get a postal vote , you 're sorted .
@ twitterid @ twitterid ahh got it !
thank you for answering !
some large promotion for 18-24 etc would be amazing !
get the ygen voting !
@ twitterid @ twitterid absolutely !
would be great if something about the eu ref & postal votes went out with the tickets !
( @ seetickets )
@ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid what an amazing idea !
this needs to happen !
make this summer count !
ludicrous that @ twitterid is not supplying a polling station for # euref - potentially the biggest vote of our lifetime
@ twitterid all you have to do is put a `` x '' for your name - it 's that easy !
@ glastofest can we work together to get all your ticket holders registered to vote ?
would love to help out with the tech
@ twitterid @ twitterid why 's it not possible to have a polling station ?
@ twitterid @ twitterid looking in to it all the ballots are the same , but i expect it 's more complex
@ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid presumably it 's not possible bc festival attendees will have assigned polling stations elsewhere ?
@ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid assuming that too , but why in this case when all ballots are the same ?
@ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid and fuck it , how about a bit of innovation ?
or how about check the calendar @ twitterid
@ twitterid thanks for that will need one
@ twitterid just featured you on my @ twitterid
@ twitterid postal votes mean corruption of the highest order .
it must not be allowed .
@ twitterid @ twitterid i want to vote but i 'm going to glasto .
postal votes must stay but should be regulated better
@ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid is @ twitterid more important than this once-in-a-lifetime chance to savethe country ?
glasto every year .
@ twitterid since i 'm voting to remain purely on the basis that it makes it easier to emigrate , you may want to dissuade me from voting !

documents.title: get involved
text: remember you can keep in touch with us throughout the day and let us know your thoughts on the stories we 're covering .
you can tweet us @ bbcnewsents or email entertainment.news @ bbc.co.uk
author: Kev Geoghegan
Arts and entertainment reporter

documents.title: gypsy revival dominates theatre awards
text: a west end revival of the musical gypsy has cleaned up at the whatsonstage theatre awards .
the show .
up four honours , including best actress in a musical for imelda staunton .
the barbican in london 's production of hamlet , starring benedict cumberbatch as the danish prince was also a big winner , earning the sherlock star best actor in a play - one of four awards .
hollywood star nicole kidman ( above ) was named best actress in a play for her role as a pioneering british scientist in photograph 51 .
read more .

documents.title: good morning
text: welcome along to monday 's live page .
we hope you had a great weekend and are feeling refreshed and ready for a busy day of entertainment news .

the v festival line-up is due to be announced later today , plus the six acts competing to represent the uk at this year 's eurovision song contest will be revealed on ken bruce 's show on bbc radio 2 .
we 'll bring you all the updates .
friday live page was , of course , dominated by the death of the author harper lee - you can read back over some of the tributes that were paid to her here .
author: Steven McIntosh
Entertainment Reporter
